name.value: HSPC Revised Geneva Score Interpretation Value Set

description.value: The set of codes, taken from Intermountain Healthcare HDD, that describe the interpretation values for the Revised Geneva Score total score.

definition.value: A pretest determination of the probability for pulmonary embolism of 8% risk
A pretest determination of the probability for pulmonary embolism of 28% risk

display.value: 11 points or more indicates high probability (74%)

definition.value: A pretest determination of the probability for pulmonary embolism of 74% risk
